title: Intel is reportedly preparing 16-core Alder Lake HX laptop processors
content:
Intel could have a couple of big additions coming to its Alder Lake lineup of mobile processors. The new processors are reportedly part of the new Intel Alder Lake HX series of processors, building on top of the existing H series, and they come with up to a whopping 16 cores and 24 threads, just

The post Intel is reportedly preparing 16-core Alder Lake HX laptop processors appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Intel could be readying a new Alder Lake HX series of processors, featuring up to 16 cores and 24 threads, just like its desktop CPUs.
